title: Transline personal account
policy: I agree with the privacy policy
description: To log in to your personal account, enter your phone number; an SMS with a verification code will be sent to it
roleDescription: Choose how you want to use the app
customerDescription: Monitor order fulfillment in real time
carrierDescription: Get up-to-date information about your shipments
codeDescription: The verification code has been sent to the number {{phone}}
driverDescription:
If you perform transportation yourself, select 'yes' and fill in the required information.

If you employ hired drivers, select 'no.' Driver information can be filled in during the next registration step.
name: Name *
license: Please provide the number and date of issue of your driver's license.
lastnameRulesPattern: Only letters (Latin or Russian) and underscores, no numbers
vuMinLength: Minimum number of digits for a driver's license is 9
vuMaxLength: Maximum number of digits for VU is 9
minAge: Must be at least 18 years of age
